description: Kikumaru Eiji is a third year student at Seishun Academy (Seigaku). He is part of Seigaku`s "Golden Pair" along with Ooishi Shuuichirou. Using his acrobatic play he can return almost any ball, even those that seem out of human reach. Eiji is also known to have the sharpest vision on the team, with an exceptional talent for seeing moving objects.
name: Kikumaru Eiji
